title: Collection, visualization, detection and enrichmentof your usage data of your electronic resources
subtitle: With our ecosystem, scale the automation of the collection of usage data publishers, of your usage data of your electronic resources, the visualization of these in dynamic dashboards.
metrics: In France, 130 institutions use ezPAARSE to process {days} days of logs and so to generate {docs} UEs distributed on {platforms} publisher's platforms and {titles} journals and ebooks distinct titles.
ezmesure: ezMESURE is an access-controlled French national repository aggregating subscribed electronic resources using statistics generated by ezPAARSE local instances of the French Higher Education and Research organizations. Since 2021, ezmesure can also collect editor usage data thanks to its ezCOUNTER module.
ezcounter: ezCOUNTER is an ezMESURE module to automate the collection of COUNTER 5 usage data from reports provided by scientific publishers and present them in dynamic and customizable dashboards. An interface allows you to enter SUSHI identifiers and set up data harvesting requests.
ezcounterSubtitle: Automatic harvester of usage data from publishers
ezreeport: ezREEPORT is an ezMESURE module to configure and automate the delivery of regular PDF reports (daily, weekly, monthly, etc.) to ezMESURE users and their teams: the evolution of usage data in the blink of an eye!
ezreeportSubtitle: Module allowing the generation of PDF reports for ezMesure
bibliomapTitle: Consultations realtime analyzed by ezPAARSE example (bibliomap).
bibliomapSubtitle: Visualization of usage data on a map
bibliomap: Bibliomap shows geo-localized access events generated by Bibliographic activity of the CNRS research community. ezPAARSE produces  real-time data displayed on a map. It monitors your ezproxy traffic and helps  the adoption of ezPAARSE in your institution by showing everyone what it is all about!

ezpaarse.text1: ezPAARSE is a free and open-source software that can infest your ( proxy ) log files and show how users access subscribed electronic resources on publishers websites.
ezpaarse.text2: ezPAARSE proposes an online form and an API allowing the manual or automatic treatment of the logs collected on the servers or proxies of your establishment.

analogist: AnalogIST is the collaborative space where all the platform analyses (pre-requisites for the creation of parsers needed by ezPAARSE) are in a knowledge base.
analogistSubtitle: Collaborative platform for the detection of usage data
ezunpaywall: ezUNPAYWALL is a mirror of data from unpaywall hosted in France by Inist CNRS. Unpaywall is a metadata repository of electronic resources of bibliographic references available in open access.
readmetrics: ReadMetrics is an ezPAARSE ezMESURE package that provides you with a comprehensive overview of your institution's electronic resource usage.

block1.title: A simple and effective tool
block1.text: Install and use it in just a few clicks!

block2.title: A dynamic an responsive team
block2.text: Don't hesitate to contact us for any question, feedback, suggestion: we are happy to help!

block3.title: A growing community
block3.text: And not only french-speaking: ezPAARSE is installed in many institutions in the USA, Singapore, Germany, and many others!
